thread.title: Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: When two out of three trees did not make it thru the year I thought I might have some problems getting them replaced. But the service was no questions asked and they took care of the problem so fast. The new trees even arrived one day before they were due to. They look great and after only a week in the ground they are already starting to bud out. I will be ordering from this orchard again ! Very pleased with the service I got.
